verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329>Musician<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H4257>Mahalath,<s%> <S%H4905>Maschil,<s%> A Psalm of <S%H1732>David.<s%> The <S%H5036>fool<s%> hath <S%H559>said<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> There is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%> <S%H7843>Corrupt<s%> are they, and have done <S%H8581>abominable<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity:<s%> there is <S%H369>none<s%> that <S%H6213>doeth<s%> <S%H2896>good.<s%>

God <S%H430><s%> looked <S%H8259>down<s%> from <S%H4480>heaven<s%> <S%H8064><s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H120>men,<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> if there <S%H3426>were<s%> any that did <S%H7919>understand,<s%> that did <S%H1875>seek<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>

Every <S%H3605>one<s%> of them is gone <S%H5472>back:<s%> they are <S%H3162>altogether<s%> become <S%H444>filthy;<s%> there is <S%H369>none<s%> that <S%H6213>doeth<s%> <S%H2896>good,<s%> <S%H369>no,<s%> <S%H1571>not<s%> <S%H259>one.<s%>

Have the <S%H6466>workers<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3045>knowledge?<s%> who eat <S%H398>up<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> as they <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread:<s%> they have <S%H3808>not<s%> called <S%H7121>upon<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>

There <S%H8033><s%> were they in great <S%H6342>fear,<s%> <S%H6343><s%> where <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H6343>fear<s%> <S%H1961>was:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H6340>scattered<s%> the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of him that <S%H2583>encampeth<s%> against thee: thou hast put them to <S%H954>shame,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H3988>despised<s%> them.

Oh <S%H4310>that<s%> <S%H5414><s%> the <S%H3444>salvation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were come out of <S%H4480>Zion!<s%> <S%H6726><s%> When <S%H430>God<s%> bringeth <S%H7725>back<s%> the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of his <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> shall <S%H1523>rejoice,<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall be <S%H8055>glad.<s%>
